```
kubectl config set-cluster kind-flask --server=https://127.0.0.1:60311 --certificate-

kubectl create token cicd-sa
kubectl config set-credentials cicd-sa --token=eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6Ik50X0N6OVZrNC1tckZSdWhjR0lzT1EzSktfUms5Ymg2UzBGa3gzdjB6WjAifQ..bezRdrhOT_dSad3QNsO3XweHNdbDGXdfnXfuEQBoi_261T8poXd3v82ODio9QJD8xT4MEj_OunuP675u2XP-sT5vLRxstQJDopFiOGFA6-uopz8C50SmYgpIGMGl0ZaHA7i4aE1kDQjUAqpnH7yzFG5O07rbfUdRu5DYoIKvaHzj5UYG-1AhlBGdp8A0h2qlM2n_5htWofvwxQ_uZ58zf82Q6Nu0MUnzy2CEG7yumYjE-8TcuBmYXGI0dhbJLFQXNZI5vLK3ezEgFOiZ3VyALJWBYcdps1o2rptxr3a_cOj8lccJkvzCYMenR7_iyUDAswscxNIYeQmX6LOYdR93sQ
kubectl config set-context kind-flask-context --cluster=kind-flask --user=cicd-sa
kubectl config use-context kind-flask-context
kubectl config view --minify --flatten > kubeconfig
```
